values:
Ok so far ive made 7 dollars ... ive seen the st francis church which was beautiful but ended up in the infirmary not so good ...in the gallery at half 7 this moning ... tb skin shot whatever that is i had to get too ... dressing up as the easter bunny today probably have a pic up .... what else ... doing portraits till 11 tonight then have to film the show till about 1 then up early for another tour of recife ... look out infirmary here i come.

Skye

Ok have to be very very quick as i only have a few minutes spare time ... first day was very bad ... did really crap photos ... and was ill for the rest of night as we set sail and i was sent to my bed till i rose at 7 this morning ... had to start off selling cameras i sold 2 but the copmission is lousy ... im now off to get quickly showered and changed for shooting portraits withe captain!! Then up early 2moro to go film the tour which sounds more fun ... after doing filming i will see if this is the job for me if not i have 8 mopre months to go!! ... but if i know its not right then i know and im not going to do something im not happy doing ... well miserable me has put her smile back on and is away to take photos.

Well last day here in miami ... leaving 2moro for a nice eight and a half hour flight to brazil! Very nervous, will get the hang of it but its the first night thats very scary!! Ah well having loads of fun at the mo anyway ... missing genna my noisy room mate ... but getting out and doing stuff ... going to the mall ... as you can see i bought a new laptop so i can keep in touch with you guys ... well im off to the office for a bit will be online later love you alll x x

Ok well last day of training and i finally find out where im going. Well first i had my final exam and yey me only one to have 100% Well im going on Holland Americas ship the Rotterdam (go have a wee look) going from Rio de Jeneiro - Salvador - Recife - Dakar - Casablanca - Cadiz - Lisbon - Valencia - Barcelona - Monte Carlo - Livorno - Civitavecchia - Tripoli - Santorini - Kusadasi - Piraeus - Istanbul - Varna and back to Rio!! And if that wasnt great enough im going in as a SENIOR isnstead of a junior!!! AHHHHHHH!! The pressure, only five photographer son this ship about 1000 passengers easy peasy!! Well im off to hooters for dinner yes mum i said hooters heehee! Will talk to all soon. Genna is leaving 2moro so dont have a laptop to steal to talk to you all so will speak on the thursday once i get settled on my ship! Oh and my final date should be the 2nd of december so will definely be home for christams yey!!

Love you all

Skye x x x x x

Hey there, well day two almost over, its eight here and just about to go down to the pool in the sunshine. It may sound all glamorous but today was well not that! Did customer service today, not looking forward to it, selling stuff no problem but certain stuff is gonna be hard, got a lot to learn. Wont know what ship im on till friday but will be going out after that where it is im going! Said about the videography and they seem very interested especially seeing as ive used final cut which is what they use. So hopefully get into that as they are expanding the videography department. Let you know more when i do. Also we have a midterm and a final exam this week!! AH!!!Then 2 weeks of forty hour training for the safety!! I mean so much to learn!! Off for a wee swim and my dunkin donuts, then another early night i think, bloody weather has given me a cold but il get over it, got to buy alka seltzr cold stuff, interesting! Anyway best be off, will update you 2moro.

Love you all x x x x

Skye x

Well here we are .... in the sunny city of miami! After a very long day yesterday, leaving one queue to join another, I have finally had a productive day. We had another medical which was tiresome but we were able to go aboard the Majesty of the Seas which was in port. I mean wow!! everyone must go on a cruise ship at some point it was amazing the amount of stuff on the ship and the top deck! The view was amazing and the heat was just perfect was an amazing experience. The crew deck were well nothing compared to the top 11 floors haha!! They were dark and dingy but didnt get to see the crew rooms, will soon enough i guess. Had a talk about going into videography the guy seemed enthusiastic about it ... going to find out more about that later ... have a few picks on my phone but forgot my wire so cant put it onto a computer! Dumbass!! But the cameras i get a cost price so il buy a wee one though my phone camera is great for just now!! Didnt have a room when i got there but i got it sorted and im sharing with Genna. Theres 14 of us here but not sure where we will all go and if we have a choice il let you know. Had my uniform fitting OH MY GOD!!! the most unflattering clothes that wouldnt look good on a cow!! Oh and guess what i had for lunch yes oh yes!! PASTA AND CHEESE!!! HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!! Oh and pizza hut for dinner tonight!

Anyhoo will update 2moro, love you all x x x x

Skye x

Well here we go, the start of my journal. Here il let you read whats been happening while ive been away. Il be putting pictures up on bebo if i can and can talk with you on bebo too but this is a way of writing down everything thats been going on, exciting or not, just everything!! It may be boring or become repetitive but hope you'll read it anyway!

Il miss you all loads also the tantrums over the tv, the tears of sad csi's, the mad dancing and mostly the laughter oh and the singing! 

Love you all x x x x
